rules: Rule1: If the platform's network is stable, then the platform is running the multiplayer game.
Rule2: Provided that a critical bug is discovered in the game, the game is released successfully.
Rule3: Whenever the critical bug in the game is fixed, the game crashes.
Rule4: Either the critical bug in the game is fixed or a critical bug is discovered in the game.
Rule5: A patch update is released for the game or the game did not crash.
Rule6: The game wins an industry award, or the game receives positive reviews from critics, or, whenever a patch update is released for the game, the players are happy with the game.
Rule7: Assuming the project met its deadline, the game did not crash.
Rule8: If the project exceeded its budget, then additional funding was secured for the project.
Rule9: In the event that the project exceeded its budget, additional funding was not secured for the project.
Rule10: The project exceeded its budget or the project met its deadline.
Rule11: Either the game's performance is optimized or the game's graphics are improved.

Rule12: Provided that the game's graphics are improved, then either the game receives positive reviews from critics or, whenever a patch update is released for the game, the players are happy with the game.
Rule13: Whenever the game's marketing campaign was successful, the game receives positive media coverage.
Rule14: Either the game's marketing campaign was successful or the game's trailer went viral.

Rule15: Given that the game's trailer went viral, then if it is false that provided the game's performance is optimized, then either the game receives positive reviews from critics or, if a patch update is released for the game, the players are happy with the game, then the game does not have high sales.
Rule16: Under the condition that a sequel for the game is planned, management approved the sequel concept.
Rule17: If management approved the sequel concept, then development of the sequel has started.
Rule18: The developer completed the coding bootcamp course or the developer has a computer science degree.
Rule19: If a playtester found the critical bug, then a critical bug was discovered in the game.
Rule20: Provided the critical bug was detected automatically, a critical bug was discovered in the game.
Rule21: Assuming the game is in the alpha testing phase, then either a playtester found the critical bug or the critical bug was detected automatically.
Rule22: In the event the game is in the beta testing phase, then either a playtester found the critical bug or the critical bug was detected automatically.
Rule23: If the game passed quality assurance, then either the game is in the alpha testing phase or the game is in the beta testing phase.
Rule24: Provided the game failed quality assurance, then either the game is in the alpha testing phase or the game is in the beta testing phase.
Rule25: Under the condition that a lead tester was assigned to the game, a senior tester was assigned to the game.
Rule26: Either a lead tester was assigned to the game or a junior tester was assigned to the game.
Rule27: If a junior tester was assigned to the game, then the game failed quality assurance.
Rule28: The game's build is stable or, if a senior tester was assigned to the game, then the game passed quality assurance.
Rule29: Provided the developer has a computer science degree, then if the developer has programming skill, the developer needs programming skill.
Rule30: A hotfix is needed for the game or the game's build is not stable.
Rule31: Given that triage for the bug is complete, then if a player submitted a bug report, then if a critical bug is not discovered in the game, a workaround is available for the game.
Rule32: Whenever investigation of the bug has started, then if a player submitted a bug report, then assuming a critical bug is not discovered in the game, a workaround is available for the game.
Rule33: Provided the bug's priority is set to high, triage for the bug is complete.
Rule34: Either the bug's priority is set to high or the bug's priority is set to medium.
Rule35: Under the condition that the bug's priority is set to medium, investigation of the bug has started.
Rule36: If the studio hired the developer, then if the developer completed the coding bootcamp course, then provided the developer has programming skill, the developer needs programming skill.
Rule37: Provided the platform's online service is active, the platform's server maintenance is complete.
Rule38: If the platform's server maintenance is complete, then the platform's network is stable.

Rule39: If it is not the case that when the game's performance is optimized, then either the game receives positive reviews from critics or, if a patch update is released for the game, the players are happy with the game, then the game has high sales.

Rule40: If it is not the case that if the game receives positive media coverage, then if it is false that when the game's performance is optimized, then either the game receives positive reviews from critics or, assuming a patch update is released for the game, the players are happy with the game, then the game does not have high sales, then a sequel for the game is planned.
Rule41: Provided a critical bug is not discovered in the game, then a workaround is not available for the game.
Rule42: Under the condition that the studio did not hire the developer, the studio rejected the developer.
Rule43: If the studio did not hire the developer, then the studio did not reject the developer.
Rule44: Provided the game was not released successfully, the developer has programming skill.
Rule45: Assuming the game was not released successfully, the platform's online service is active.
Rule46: Under the condition that the game was not released successfully, the developer does not need programming skill.
facts: Fact1: A player submitted a bug report.
Fact2: The players are not happy with the game.
Fact3: The game did not receive positive reviews from critics.
Fact4: The game did not win an industry award.
Fact5: Development of the sequel has not started.
Fact6: A hotfix is not needed for the game.
Fact7: The platform is not running the multiplayer game.
